languages.text: "Данная единица не введена в командную иерархию экипажа "Герметико". Ей необходимо... представиться корабельной системе, чтобы ее право приказывать было подтверждено".
"This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."
languages.original_text: "Данная единица не введена в командную иерархию экипажа "Герметико". Ей необходимо... представиться корабельной системе, чтобы ее право приказывать было подтверждено".

traits.locale_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for a confirmation of its authority to issue orders."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for a confirmation of its authority to issue orders."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「このユニットはヘルメティコの命令系統から外れている。となると…権限の承認には船のシステムに照会しなくてはなりません」
languages.original_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."

traits.locale_text: 「このユニットはヘルメティコの命令系統から外れている。となると…権限の承認には船のシステムに照会しなくてはなりません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “本单位并不是隐士之舟号指挥系统的一部分。本单位必须……在船上的系统进行注册，以确认命令的权威性。”
languages.original_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."

traits.locale_text: “本单位并不是隐士之舟号指挥系统的一部分。本单位必须……在船上的系统进行注册，以确认命令的权威性。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette unité ne fait pas partie de la chaîne de commandement de l'Hermetico. Elle doit d'abord... se présenter au système du vaisseau pour confirmer son autorité. »
languages.original_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."

traits.locale_text: « Cette unité ne fait pas partie de la chaîne de commandement de l'Hermetico. Elle doit d'abord... se présenter au système du vaisseau pour confirmer son autorité. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta unidad no forma parte de la cadena de mando del Hermético. Debe... presentarse al sistema de la nave para confirmar su autoridad».
languages.original_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."

traits.locale_text: «Esta unidad no forma parte de la cadena de mando del Hermético. Debe... presentarse al sistema de la nave para confirmar su autoridad».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Einheit ist nicht Teil der Hermetico-Befehlskette. Sie muss ... sich dem System des Schiffs vorstellen, um ihre Autorität zu bestätigen."
languages.original_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Einheit ist nicht Teil der Hermetico-Befehlskete. Sie muss ... sich dem System des Schiffs vorstellen, um ihre Autorität zu bestätigen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu birim, Hermetico'nun emir komuta zincirinde yer almıyor. Yetkisinin onayı için kendisini geminin sistemine tanıtmalı."
languages.original_text: "This unit is not part of the Hermetico chain of command. It must... introduce itself to the ship's system for confirmation of its authority."

traits.locale_text: "Bu birim, Hermetico'nun emir komuta zincirinin bir parçası değil. Yetkisinin onayı için kendisini geminin sistemine tanıtmalı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
